name: zabbix
description: Zabbix monitoring system integration. Provides comprehensive access to Zabbix API for managing hosts, items, triggers, problems, and more.

auth_method.description: Authentication method: 'token' for API token or 'credentials' for username/password

zabbix_token.description: Zabbix API token (required if auth_method is 'token')

functions.name: host_get
functions.parameters: params: dict - Query parameters (output, selectGroups, filter, etc.)
functions.returns: JSON string containing list of hosts

functions.name: host_create
functions.description: Create a new host in Zabbix
functions.parameters: params: dict - Host configuration (host, groups, interfaces, etc.)
functions.returns: JSON string with created host IDs

functions.name: host_update
functions.returns: JSON string with updated host IDs

functions.name: host_delete
functions.parameters: hostids: list - List of host IDs to delete
functions.returns: JSON string with deleted host IDs

functions.name: problem_get
functions.parameters: params: dict - Query parameters (recent, limit, severity, etc.)
functions.returns: JSON string containing list of problems

functions.name: item_get
functions.parameters: params: dict - Query parameters (hostids, output, filter, etc.)
functions.returns: JSON string containing list of items

functions.name: trigger_get
functions.parameters: params: dict - Query parameters (hostids, output, filter, etc.)
functions.returns: JSON string containing list of triggers

functions.name: history_get
functions.parameters: params: dict - Query parameters (itemids, time_from, time_till, limit, etc.)

functions.name: event_get
functions.parameters: params: dict - Query parameters (eventids, output, filter, etc.)
functions.returns: JSON string containing list of events

functions.name: event_acknowledge
functions.parameters: params: dict - Acknowledge parameters (eventids, message, action, etc.)

functions.name: hostgroup_get
functions.returns: JSON string containing list of host groups

functions.name: template_get
functions.returns: JSON string containing list of templates

functions.name: user_get
functions.returns: JSON string containing list of users

functions.name: maintenance_get
functions.returns: JSON string containing list of maintenance periods
